extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 and (GPHY240 or GPHY247 or KNPE251 or PHED251), or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Geographical approaches to the relationship between human health and environment. Individual and population health outcomes of physical and social environmental influences and the development of policy responses.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Geography, the Environment and Human Health
